ns:common.topic.description: Strand is a high-level symbolic language for parallel computing, similar in syntax to Prolog.\nArtificial Intelligence Ltd were awarded the British Computer Society Award for Technical Innovation 1989 for Strand88. The language was created by computer scientists Ian Foster and Stephen Taylor.
rdfs:label: Strand

ns:common.document.text: Strand is a high-level symbolic language for parallel computing, similar in syntax to Prolog.\nArtificial Intelligence Ltd were awarded the British Computer Society Award for Technical Innovation 1989 for Strand88. The language was created by computer scientists Ian Foster and Stephen Taylor.
